name: Hollywood Casino Charles Town
description:
Welcome to Hollywood! Download the official mobile app for Hollywood Casino at Charles Town Races and experience an exciting, friendly, and total entertainment experience. Whether you’re looking to play free slots right on your mobile device, or visit us on-property for the hottest slots, table games, thoroughbred racing, and dining, the app has got you covered! Who needs Vegas? This is Hollywood!

Features Include:

MOBILE CASINO
Put Hollywood Casino in your pocket! Get instant access to Hollywood Casino’s free slots on your mobile devices. Enjoy authentic slot content with free-to-play versions of your favorite slot games. You’ll have access to free-play versions of some of your favorite games from our casino, including Bier Haus™, Forbidden Dragons™, Reels O’ Dublin™ and more!

CASINO
Feel the excitement with over 2,700 slots, table games, and our no-limit, 24/7 live poker room!

HOTEL
Browse all of our room offerings and amenities at The Inn at Charles Town - the perfect oasis located steps from all the exciting casino action. Use the app to make your reservations with just a few taps.

RACING
You can leave the pen and paper at home. Use the app to get information on live racing post times, and check out the live racing and simulcast schedule while you’re at it!

DINING AND ENTERTAINMENT
Whether you’re looking to make a reservation at Final Cut Steakhouse, or check out some free live entertainment at H Lounge, the app has got you covered. Get info, menus, hours of operation, and more. You can even purchase tickets to first-class, Hollywood-style entertainment at The Event Center and the Hollywood Comedy Club.

MAPS AND INFO
Drop a pin on our overhead GPS map to remember where you parked or easily get directions from your current location. Our contact directory can also put you in touch with the casino, the golf course, and info on private parties and bus tours.

GET SOCIAL
Find out about the latest buzz before, during and after your visit! Connect with us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, or check out our YouTube channel. You can also share content in the app with your friends and family.

AND MUCH MORE!
